algorithm_technique: String traversal with hash map lookup for bracketed keys
problem_summary_simple: Replace bracketed keys in a string with their values from a knowledge base.
problem_summary_technical: Iterate through the string, identify bracketed keys, look up values in a hash map, and build the result string.
time_complexity: O(n + m) where n is string length, m is knowledge length
space_complexity: O(n + m) where n is string length, m is knowledge length (for hash map and result string)
key_insights: A hash map is ideal for efficient key-value lookups.
Iterate through the string, accumulating characters within brackets.
Handle missing keys by replacing with '?'.
